fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each night. If they were *noticed* more than you, you will clean them as well.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- To be *noticed* is to be specifically mentioned or pinged in a message in any day chat which doesn't specifically mention or ping any other player. No one is able to *notice* themselves.
- Your kills appear to come from The Shade (429), Zodiac Killer (3416) or Alone (3677). You may choose which and switch at any time.
- This attribute becomes active on Day 6. If you are the player who has been *noticed* the least, the game ends immediately in your victory.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who? would oppose you.
